root.name: Wipeout: The Game
root.description: Overview Wipeout: The Game involves players maneuvering their selected character through video-game versions of the actual real-life courses featured on the television show. Players use the Wiimote to jump and the nunchuk to move their character. UK VersionThe UK version of the game is based on the UK version of Wipeout, known as Total Wipeout. The video-game version of Total Wipeout is called The Ultimate Big Red Ball Challenge. The only difference are the presenters (the show is hosted by Top Gear presenter Richard Hammond) and some of the courses. Fun Fact: The Wipeout: The Game Quick Look was the final Quick Look filmed in Giant Bomb's original office in Sausolito, California.
